text:
Immunization is a key #publichealth strategy in overcoming the #SARSCoV2 #pandemic
I took the #firstdose of the #moderna #covid19 #vaccine and my father-in-law, 65yo #essentialworker, took his too.
Consider yours too!
#vaccinationworks #vaccinessavelivess #spreadknowledgenotfear https://t.co/uEvRfrM2dX
